pages.text: $(li)The Stables is a structure that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)A long time ago, this was a stable used by the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l), unfortunately the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombie$(/l) infection affected them.
$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horses$(/l) were affected by the infection aswell, turning them into zombified and skeletonized versions of themselves.
